attributes.action: Make sure British passport holders are required to collect and sign for their passports not have them dropped on doormats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently passports are delivered to the home address of the applicant, in some cases just dropped on the doormat (personal experience).

In these days of heightened security I would suggest that all passports are delivered to the local police station or post office to be collected in person so that the identity of the receiver can be confirmed.

A small inconvienience for some but as a passport is basically issued for the purpose of travel abroad a trip to the local pick up point should be no problem.
